extension.description:
Repository for custom Kodi builds and addons curated by GUS Face. Contains clean, tested builds and selected addons.
Install this repository to get access to: - GUS Face custom Kodi builds - Curated addon collections - Regular updates and maintenance
To install: Download the repository ZIP and install from ZIP file in Kodi.
extension.disclaimer: Use at your own risk. This repository contains third-party addons. Always backup your Kodi configuration before installing builds.
